subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is regarded as the father of modern Rajasthani literature?
question_hi: आधुनिक राजस्थानी साहित्य के पिता के रूप में कौन मान्य हैं?
explanation_en: Shiv Ram Sharma (1902–1980) is widely acknowledged as the father of modern Rajasthani literature for his pioneering efforts in prose and poetry.
explanation_hi: शिव राम शर्मा (1902–1980) को आधुनिक राजस्थानी साहित्य के पिता के रूप में व्यापक रूप से मान्यता प्राप्त है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which 18th‑century poet is best known for the epic poem ‘Mewar ki Sangeet’?
question_hi: 18वीं शताब्दी के किस कवि को ‘मewar की संगीत’ महाकाव्य के लिए सबसे अधिक जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Suryamal Jaiswal (1705–1785) authored the celebrated epic ‘Mewar ki Sangeet’, a key work of medieval Rajasthani literature.
explanation_hi: सूर्यमाल जैसवाल (1705–1785) ने प्रसिद्ध महाकाव्य ‘मewar की संगीत’ लिखा, जो मध्यकालीन राजस्थानी साहित्य का एक प्रमुख कार्य है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani novel, published in 1905, is considered the first novel in the Rajasthani language?
question_hi: 1905 में प्रकाशित कौन सा राजस्थानी उपन्यास राजस्थानी भाषा का पहला उपन्यास माना जाता है?
explanation_en: The novel ‘Bharat’ by Mahadevji is credited as the first Rajasthani novel, setting a precedent for later prose works.
explanation_hi: महादेवजी का उपन्यास ‘भारत’ राजस्थानी भाषा का पहला उपन्यास माना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which form of Rajasthani folk poetry is traditionally sung during the ‘Mela’?
question_hi: कौन सा राजस्थानी लोककाव्य रूप सामान्यतः ‘मेला’ के दौरान गाया जाता है?
explanation_en: Folk ballads, known locally as ‘Surs’ or ‘Mela Geet’, are integral to Rajasthani cultural festivals.
explanation_hi: लोक गीत, जिन्हें स्थानीय रूप से ‘सुर्स’ या ‘मेला गीत’ कहा जाता है, राजस्थानी सांस्कृतिक त्योहारों का अभिन्न हिस्सा हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani writer received the Sahitya Akademi Award for his work ‘Kashmir Ki Kahani’?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी लेखक को ‘कश्मीर की कहानी’ के लिए साहित्य अकादमी पुरस्कार मिला?
explanation_en: Manohar Singh’s ‘Kashmir Ki Kahani’ earned him the Sahitya Akademi Award, highlighting his contribution to Rajasthani prose.
explanation_hi: मनोहार सिंह की ‘कश्मीर की कहानी’ को साहित्य अकादमी पुरस्कार मिला, जो उनके राजस्थानी गद्य में योगदान को दर्शाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani poet is known for his satirical poems about the lives of common people?
question_hi: कौन सा राजस्थानी कवि सामान्य लोगों के जीवन पर व्यंग्यात्मक कविताओं के लिए प्रसिद्ध है?
explanation_en: Bhanwar Singh’s satirical verses, especially in his collection ‘Vyangya Vistaar’, vividly depict rural Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: भनवार सिंह के व्यंग्यात्मक श्लोक, विशेष रूप से ‘व्यंग्य विस्तार’ संग्रह में, ग्रामीण राजस्थान को जीवंत रूप से दर्शाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which medieval Rajasthani literary form is characterized by a series of moral aphorisms?
